BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_TELEPHONE_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_TELEPHONE_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_SERVICE_PROVIDER, STR_INSTRUMENT_TYPE, STR_INSTRUMENT_MODEL_NO, STR_TELEPHONE_NO, DT_ISSUE_DATE, DT_BILLING_CYCLE, NUM_UNIT, STR_CONNECTION_REQUIRED, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE EST_TELEPHONE_MST SET STR_SERVICE_PROVIDER=?,STR_INSTRUMENT_TYPE=?,STR_INSTRUMENT_MODEL_NO=?,STR_TELEPHONE_NO=?,DT_ISSUE_DATE=?,DT_BILLING_CYCLE=?,NUM_UNIT=?,STR_CONNECTION_REQUIRED=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?,GSTR_REMARKS=?,GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE NUM_TELEPHONE_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_TELEPHONE_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1) WHERE T.NUM_TELEPHONE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO EST_TELEPHONE_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_TELEPHONE_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_SERVICE_PROVIDER, STR_INSTRUMENT_TYPE, STR_INSTRUMENT_MODEL_NO, STR_TELEPHONE_NO, DT_ISSUE_DATE, DT_BILLING_CYCLE, NUM_UNIT, STR_CONNECTION_REQUIRED, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_TELEPHONE_MST T SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_TELEPHONE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_TELEPHONE_MST T SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_TELEPHONE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO EST_TELEPHONE_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_TELEPHONE_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_SERVICE_PROVIDER, STR_INSTRUMENT_TYPE, STR_INSTRUMENT_MODEL_NO, STR_TELEPHONE_NO, DT_ISSUE_DATE, DT_BILLING_CYCLE, NUM_UNIT, STR_CONNECTION_REQUIRED, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_TELEPHONE_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.NUM_TELEPHONE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
